entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
